title: Effect of fertility levels and stress mitigating chemicals on nutrient content, uptake, intercropping advantage and competition effect in cowpea-baby corn intercropping
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Anju Bijarnia, J.P. Tetarwal, Rajendra Kumar Yadav, A.L. Bijrania, Deepak Singh, Yonika Saini
